header.title: Foys - a team of creators & innovators
header.description: Helping businesses grow through the power of IT-technologies.

header.title: The Values We Live By
header.description: Our clients and their customers always come first.

valuesBlocks.title: Daily Hard Work
valuesBlocks.text: We keep our promises, clear deadlines & functionality

valuesBlocks.title: Passion before money
valuesBlocks.text: Absolutely free, design, only if you like it we continue working

valuesBlocks.title: Guarantees
valuesBlocks.text: After the end of the project, you will have half of the money for 1 month as a deposit if something goes wrong.

team.text1: Focus On Your Software - is a unique IT company dedicated to providing affordable and comprehensive IT services across a wide range of domains. With a focus on delivering cost-effective solutions without compromising quality, we enable businesses of all sizes to leverage the power of technology and achieve their goals within budget. Since our establishment in 2021, we have been committed to making IT services accessible to all businesses, from startups to small and medium enterprises. We understand that cost considerations are vital, especially for emerging businesses, and we strive to provide budget-friendly solutions that do not compromise on excellence.
team.text2: Foys is a comprehensive IT company that offers a wide range of solutions to meet all your technology needs. We are a one-stop destination for businesses seeking expert assistance in website redesign and digitalization of the IT industry. With our diverse expertise and a team of skilled professionals, we strive to provide exceptional services and drive digital transformation for our clients.
